categories: Category:Galactic Empire science and engineering personnel

nodes.text: Director Lenzer was the head of research for Imperial Grand Admiral Demetrius Zaarin's TIE Experimental Project.

According to recovered data logs during the battle at Research Station Obsidian, Director Lenzer fled the scene in an Imperial shuttle. Admiral Zaarin's staff were unable to determine whether the director survived, but conceded that there was a high probability that he was killed during the fighting.
Director Lenzer never appears on-screen anywhere in the game, and the shuttle in which he presumably tries to escape in is never seen during the attack on Obsidian.
